Thalassemia: Foods rich in folate (leafy greens, beans).
Vitamin C rich foods to help iron absorption (fruits like orange).
Avoid excessive iron supplements unless doctor advises.
Sickle Cell Anemia: Stay hydrated; fluids reduce sickling risk.
Foods high in folate and iron (if prescribed).
Balanced diet with fruits and vegetables.
Asthma: Maintain a balanced diet; avoid known food triggers.
General Illness: Eat balanced meals, stay hydrated, and rest.
